item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:

8. Debug Go core dumps with delve: export byte slices (6 points | no comments)
9. Rustls Outperforms OpenSSL and BoringSSL (6 points | 1 comment)
10. How to secure your new VPS: a step-by-step guide (27 points | 33 comments)
11. 20 years of Linux on the Desktop (part 1) (53 points | 70 comments)
12. Microsoft maintains its own Windows debloat scripts on GitHub (29 points | 6 comments)

15. Jujutsu in practice (45 points | 18 comments)
16. ‘Reflections on Trusting Trust’, but completely by accident this time (5 points | no comments)

21. Naming Conventions That Need to Die (2018) (55 points | 72 comments)
